entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 along the coast overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy along parts of the coast with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 along the coast.
